verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “A hehpihhuai kei nong huhna, a tha zawngkhal kei nong hotna, hih bang ahi hiam?
verses.3: Kei bang mihai tungah thu manpha nong gen a, pilna thu tampi nong pulak hi.
verses.4: Tua bang thu a gen dingin kua in hong sawl a, kuaʼ lungsim hong pulak khia na hi hiam?
verses.5: “Misiteʼ gam kiliing a, a sunga a teeng mite launa tawh a liing hi.
verses.6: Pasianʼ muhna ah misiteʼ gam kilang sinsen a, a muh theih loh nadingin a liah bangmah om lo hi.
verses.7: Pasian in mun awng tungah vanpi hong zal khia a, bangmah in a len lopi-in leitung a khai lingleng hi.
verses.8: Amah in meii lom lakah tuite khol a, tua a gik mahmah tui meii a pua zosak hi.
verses.9: Amah in kha a liah ding bawl a, meii tawh kha a khuh hi.
verses.10: Amah in muh tawpna ah git dinden a, khuavak le khuamial a khen hi.
verses.11: Amah in vanpi a pua khuampite a taii ciangin tua khuampite lau-in a liing uh hi.
verses.12: Ama thahatna tawh tuipi zo a, ama siamna tawh tui ganhing golpi Rahab that lum hi.
verses.13: A hu a san ciangin vantung teng siang pah a, ama khut in a tai khia gulpi that lum hi.
verses.14: Hihte pen ama vangliatna them khat bek hi pan a, i zak thute pen a hemlam bek hi pan hi. Pasian a liatna taktak kuaʼn thei zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
